Articles.Content:
Hi there,

maybe i someone is interested in my doings. Feedback is welcome, if somebody likes to have a craft-file of a mentioned ship, simply ask for it in this thread.

Mod I use: B9_Aerospace, DeadlyReentry, FerramAerospaceResearch, KAS, ProceduralFairings, Kethane, KSPX, MechJeb2, RemoteTech, TacFuelBalancer.

First one: Landing @Duna:

Problems: The lander hardly missed a drogue cute, so i have to spend ~500m/s delta-v to slow the lander down near the landing place. If i don't do so, the lander will desingrate on the moment the normal cutes become full deployed.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Changelog of the Duna-Story:

11.08.2013 - Start

12.08.2013 - Added Duna-Plane Pictures

Edited August 12, 2013 by Jasmir
Very interesting lander design Jasmir, good luck with your kethane harvest

New story, this time from beginning to the end,

A trip to Laythe (Picturestory), more informations are in the image descriptions.
